verse:
का त्वं मुक्तिरुपागतासि भवती कस्मादकस्मादिह ।
श्रीकृष्णस्मरणेन देव भवतो दासी पदं प्रापिता ॥
दूरे तिष्ठमनागनागसिकथं कुर्यादनार्यं मयि ।
 त्वद् गन्धान् निज नाम चन्दन रसालेपस्य लोपो भवेत् ॥

terms.अनागनागसिकथं: from the stories of the worldly pleasures

meaning: Meaning:Who are?  I am liberation personified ? why have you come here ? Since you remember Lord Krishna,  I have come to attain the position of Your servant. Stay far away from the stories of worldly pleasures, O mind. Do not engage in ungodly activities towards me. Your fragrance would make my name sandalwood bliss lost.
